main.name: Yonah Karp
main.description: a Master's Degree in CS (specialization in AI/ML). I enjoy frontend work most, but I'm proficient across the full stack
main.bio: Software Developer with 7+ years professional experience. Genuinely enjoys programming, hard worker, fast and avid learner, capable and persistent problem solver, can synthesize information efficiently. Great teamwork and communication skills. Detail oriented with an eye for clean design.

resume.skillmessage: Below are some of the many technologies I use frequently and throughout my career

work.title: Senior Full Stack Web Developer
description: Spearheaded the modernization of a web application using React/Redux to transform it into a sleek Single Page Application, enhancing the user experience.
Led as the Directly Responsible Individual (DRI) for the implementation of a new design system, orchestrating a comprehensive revamp of the web app's visual identity and user interface.
Seamlessly integrated a 3rd-party ID verification library, elevating the investment process by streamlining user interactions.
Engineered significant enhancements by restructuring inefficient API calls, resulting in reduced load times and an overall improved user experience.
Contributed to the full stack of the web app, creating three new pages and crafting dozens of reusable components to enhance functionality and efficiency.

work.title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Developed infrastructure and models for AiDa, the company's internal ML platform
Handled development, devops, and QA tasks in a fast paced, multi- time zone team
Configured, tested, and deployed Docker containers for ML services such as invoice, reciept, and bank statement recognition
Benchmarked and balanced load of services

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: Developed improvements to frontend, middleware and backend of two credit card application web apps in a Scrum team of six
Finalist (2nd place) in internal Company-wide Hackathon.
Built out automation and unit test suite for React web app.
Served as rotating Scrum Master, running team meetings and helping clear blockers

work.title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Collaborated on frontend development of Single Page Application in a team of 4 developers
Led team statistically, completing over 50% of team's 2018 workload in assigned hours and tasks.
Worked closely with Google as B&H's primary AMP developer, cutting page-load by over 75%.
Implemented service worker for offline access & faster page transitions.
Built 3 new pages and multiple JS components for the mobile website.

work.title: Software Developer
description: Created full-featured Ionic (Angular) mobile app as company's only dev.
Produced and maintained project's joint SQL/SQLite database.
Worked closely with designer and client in agile development paradigm

work.title: Software Developer
description: Finished development and deployed native Android application.

projects.title: Relaxful
projects.category: An e-commerce shop I built for a client to sell pillows

projects.title: un-Kinect
projects.category: A kinect like movement system for controlling games using webcam and body motion

projects.title: React Weather
projects.category: A nice weather application built in React using the Dark Sky api

projects.title: Hex Guess
projects.category: A react app to test how well you can identify the hex of a color

projects.title: Smartspeedr
projects.category: Chrome extension providing overcast-like smartspeed to speed up silences.

testimonials.text: Yonah is an intelligent and creative individual with the motivation to get things done. His knowledge and vast understanding of fields relating to software development helped us in achieving our high level goals. If you're lucky enough to have the opportunity to work with him, grab him - as he's a valuable asset to any company.
testimonials.user: Elliot Scharcz - CEO of an E-Commerce Company

testimonials.text: Yonah was a student in a number of my computer science courses at Touro College and his performance consistently placed him among the top students in the class. He is intelligent and ambitious and his questions in class reflect a keen eye for detail. I am confident that he has a promising career ahead of him and I would be happy to answer specific questions for anyone who is considering him.
testimonials.user: Yitzchak Novick - Professor at Touro College
